special_text:
[+1]: Create a 0/1 white Egg creature token.
[0]: Another target creature or planeswalker loses all abilities and becomes a blue Bird creature with base power and toughness 2/2 and slipstream. [i](It can’t be blocked as long as only creatures with slipstream are attacking.)[/i]
[-5]: Exile up to three target creatures, then return those cards to the battlefield under your control.
